mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" = '1' THEN '21' WHEN A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" = '2' THEN '21' WHEN A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" = '3' THEN '22' END AS dataKubun , CASE WHEN A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" = '1' THEN '加算' WHEN A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" = '2' THEN '加算' WHEN A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" = '3' THEN '減算' END AS shukeiKubun , '' AS hyoNo , '' AS shukeiNo , '1' AS shukeiTani , '' AS tateNo , '' AS yokoNo , A."inputShikibetsuNo" , A."shokisaiHokenshaNo" , A."hiHokenshaNo" AS hihokenshaNo , A."serviceTeikyoYM" , A."kyufuJissekiKubunCode" , A."jigyoshoNo" AS jigyoshaNo , A."toshiNo" AS seiriNo , '' AS meisaiNo , A."seiriNo" AS motoSeiriNo , '' AS shinseiKanrisikyuKubunCode , A."umareYMD" , A."yoKaigoJotaiKubunCode" , A."kyuSochiNyushoshaTokureiCode" , A."hokenKyufuritsu" , A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" , '' AS shokujihiyoHokenshaNo , 0 AS kihonTeikyoNissu , 0 AS tokubetsuTeikyoNissu , 0 AS shokujiTeikyoNobeNissu , 0 AS kihonTeikyoTanka , 0 AS tokubetsuTeikyoTanka , 0 AS atoShokujiTeikyoSeikyuGaku , '' AS shokujiHiyosikyuKubunCode , 0 AS shokujiHiyosikyuGaku , CASE WHEN B."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL THEN B."serviceSyuruiCode" WHEN C."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL THEN SUBSTRING(C."serviceCode", 1, 2) ELSE NULL END AS serviceSyuruiCode , B."hokenTanisuTani" AS seikyuTensuTanka , B."hokenSeikyugaku" AS seikyugaku , B."hokenRiyoshaFutangaku" AS riyoshaFutangaku , B."atoHokenTanisuTotal" AS atoTensuGokei , B."atoHokenSeikyugaku" AS atoHokenSeikyugaku , B."atoHokenDekidakaTanisuTotal" AS atoDekidakaTensuGokei , B."atoHokenDekidakaSeikyugaku" AS atoDekidakaSeikyuGaku , '' AS shukeiShikyukubunCode , 0 AS shukeiShikyuKingaku , 0 AS zougenten , CASE WHEN C."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL THEN C."atoServiceTanisuTotal" ELSE 0 END AS atoTensu , CASE WHEN C."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL THEN C."atoSeikyuKingaku" ELSE 0 END AS atoSeikyuKingaku , '' AS keikakuhiShikyukubunCode , 0 AS keikakuhiShikyuKingaku , 0 AS meisaiTensu , '' AS shikakuKubun , '' AS shichosonCode , '' AS kyuShichosonCode , '' AS genbutsubunSonzaiFlag , '' AS futanWariaiNendo , 10 AS futanWariaiKubun , #{集計年月} AS shinsaYM , '' AS riyoshaFutanGenmenHihokenshaNo , '9' AS sakuseiKubunErrorFlag , '1' AS futanWariaiErrorFlag , '0' AS zengoKyufurituErrorFlag , 1 AS shukei0x01 , 0 AS shukei0x02 , 0 AS shukei0x03 , 0 AS shukei0x04 , 0 AS saikeibunHokenritu , 0 AS saikeiShukei0x04 , '1' AS rirekiFlag FROM rgdb."DbT3017KyufujissekiKihon" AS A LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT3033KyufujissekiShukei" AS B ON A."inputShikibetsuNo" = B."inputShikibetsuNo" AND A."hiHokenshaNo" = B."hiHokenshaNo" AND A."serviceTeikyoYM" = B."serviceTeikyoYM" AND A."jigyoshoNo" = B."jigyoshoNo" AND A."seiriNo" = B."seiriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT3025KyufujissekiKyotakuService" AS C ON A."inputShikibetsuNo" = C."inputShikibetsuNo" AND A."hiHokenshaNo" = C."hiHokenshaNo" AND A."serviceTeikyoYM" = C."serviceTeikyoYM" AND A."jigyoshoNo" = C."jigyoshoNo" AND A."seiriNo" = C."seiriNo" WHERE A."inputShikibetsuNo" NOT LIKE '816%' AND A."inputShikibetsuNo" NOT LIKE '71P%' AND A."inputShikibetsuNo" NOT LIKE '817%' AND A."inputShikibetsuNo" NOT LIKE '71R%' AND A."kyufuJissekiKubunCode" = '2' AND ( ( B."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL and B."serviceSyuruiCode" <> '81' ) OR ( C."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL AND C."servicePlanhiMeisaiLineNo" = '99' ) ) AND (A."hiHokenshaNo" || A."serviceTeikyoYM") IN ( SELECT DISTINCT D."hiHokenshaNo" || D."serviceTeikyoYM" FROM rgdb."DbT3036ShokanHanteiKekka" AS D WHERE SUBSTRING(D."ketteiYMD", 1, 6) = #{集計年月} )

SELECT '22' AS dataKubun , '減算' AS shukeiKubun , '' AS hyoNo , '' AS shukeiNo , '1' AS shukeiTani , '' AS tateNo , '' AS yokoNo , A."inputShikibetsuNo" , A."shokisaiHokenshaNo" , A."hiHokenshaNo" AS hihokenshaNo , A."serviceTeikyoYM" , A."kyufuJissekiKubunCode" , A."jigyoshoNo" AS jigyoshaNo , A."toshiNo" AS seiriNo , '' AS meisaiNo , A."seiriNo" AS motoSeiriNo , '' AS shinseiKanrisikyuKubunCode , A."umareYMD" , A."yoKaigoJotaiKubunCode" , A."kyuSochiNyushoshaTokureiCode" , A."hokenKyufuritsu" , A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" , '' AS shokujihiyoHokenshaNo , 0 AS kihonTeikyoNissu , 0 AS tokubetsuTeikyoNissu , 0 AS shokujiTeikyoNobeNissu , 0 AS kihonTeikyoTanka , 0 AS tokubetsuTeikyoTanka , 0 AS atoShokujiTeikyoSeikyuGaku , '' AS shokujiHiyosikyuKubunCode , 0 AS shokujiHiyosikyuGaku , CASE WHEN B."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL THEN B."serviceSyuruiCode" WHEN C."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL THEN SUBSTRING(C."serviceCode", 1, 2) ELSE NULL END AS serviceSyuruiCode , B."hokenTanisuTani" AS seikyuTensuTanka , B."hokenSeikyugaku" AS seikyugaku , B."hokenRiyoshaFutangaku" AS riyoshaFutangaku , B."atoHokenTanisuTotal" AS atoTensuGokei , B."atoHokenSeikyugaku" AS atoHokenSeikyugaku , B."atoHokenDekidakaTanisuTotal" AS atoDekidakaTensuGokei , B."atoHokenDekidakaSeikyugaku" AS atoDekidakaSeikyuGaku , '' AS shukeiShikyukubunCode , 0 AS shukeiShikyuKingaku , 0 AS zougenten , CASE WHEN C."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL THEN C."atoServiceTanisuTotal" ELSE 0 END AS atoTensu , CASE WHEN C."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL THEN C."atoSeikyuKingaku" ELSE 0 END AS atoSeikyuKingaku , '' AS keikakuhiShikyukubunCode , 0 AS keikakuhiShikyuKingaku , 0 AS meisaiTensu , '' AS shikakuKubun , '' AS shichosonCode , '' AS kyuShichosonCode , '' AS genbutsubunSonzaiFlag , '' AS futanWariaiNendo , 10 AS futanWariaiKubun ,#{集計年月} AS shinsaYM , '' AS riyoshaFutanGenmenHihokenshaNo , '9' AS sakuseiKubunErrorFlag , '1' AS futanWariaiErrorFlag , CASE WHEN A."hokenKyufuritsu" <> CAST(F."hokenKyufuritsu" AS text) THEN '1' WHEN A."hokenKyufuritsu" = CAST(F."hokenKyufuritsu" AS text) THEN '0' END AS zengoKyufurituErrorFlag , 1 AS shukei0x01 , 0 AS shukei0x02 , 0 AS shukei0x03 , 0 AS shukei0x04 , 0 AS saikeibunHokenritu , 0 AS saikeiShukei0x04 , '0' AS rirekiFlag FROM rgdb."DbT3017KyufujissekiKihon" AS A LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT3033KyufujissekiShukei" AS B ON A."inputShikibetsuNo" = B."inputShikibetsuNo" AND A."hiHokenshaNo" = B."hiHokenshaNo" AND A."serviceTeikyoYM" = B."serviceTeikyoYM" AND A."jigyoshoNo" = B."jigyoshoNo" AND A."seiriNo" = B."seiriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT3025KyufujissekiKyotakuService" AS C ON A."inputShikibetsuNo" = C."inputShikibetsuNo" AND A."hiHokenshaNo" = C."hiHokenshaNo" AND A."serviceTeikyoYM" = C."serviceTeikyoYM" AND A."jigyoshoNo" = C."jigyoshoNo" AND A."seiriNo" = C."seiriNo" LEFT JOIN "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" AS F ON A."inputShikibetsuNo" = F."inputShikibetsuNo" AND A."hiHokenshaNo" = F."hihokenshaNo" AND A."serviceTeikyoYM" = F."serviceTeikyoYM" AND A."jigyoshoNo" = F."jigyoshaNo" AND A."seiriNo" = F."seiriNo" WHERE A."inputShikibetsuNo" NOT LIKE '816%' AND A."inputShikibetsuNo" NOT LIKE '71P%' AND A."inputShikibetsuNo" NOT LIKE '817%' AND A."inputShikibetsuNo" NOT LIKE '71R%' AND A."kyufuJissekiKubunCode" = '2' AND (B."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL OR (C."hiHokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL AND C."servicePlanhiMeisaiLineNo" = '99') ) AND ( A."inputShikibetsuNo" || A."hiHokenshaNo" || A."serviceTeikyoYM" || A."jigyoshoNo" || A."shinsaYM" || A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" ) IN (SELECT D."inputShikibetsuNo" || D."hiHokenshaNo" || D."serviceTeikyoYM" || D."jigyoshoNo" || MAX(D."shinsaYM") || Min(D."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode") FROM rgdb."DbT3017KyufujissekiKihon" AS D , "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" AS E WHERE E."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" IN ('2', '3') AND D."inputShikibetsuNo" = E."inputShikibetsuNo" AND D."hiHokenshaNo" = E."hihokenshaNo" AND D."serviceTeikyoYM" = E."serviceTeikyoYM" AND D."jigyoshoNo" = E."jigyoshaNo" AND D."shinsaYM" < #{集計年月} AND D."kyufuJissekiKubunCode" = '2' GROUP BY D."inputShikibetsuNo" , D."hiHokenshaNo" , D."serviceTeikyoYM" , D."jigyoshoNo")
mapper.update: UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" AS temp SET "atoTensu" = ( SELECT SUM(dbT3025."atoServiceTanisuTotal") FROM rgdb."DbT3025KyufujissekiKyotakuService" AS dbT3025 WHERE temp."hihokenshaNo" = dbT3025."hiHokenshaNo" AND temp."serviceTeikyoYM" = dbT3025."serviceTeikyoYM" AND temp."inputShikibetsuNo" = dbT3025."inputShikibetsuNo" AND temp."jigyoshaNo" = dbT3025."jigyoshoNo" AND temp."seiriNo" = dbT3025."toshiNo" GROUP BY dbT3025."hiHokenshaNo", dbT3025."serviceTeikyoYM") WHERE SUBSTRING(temp."inputShikibetsuNo", 1, 3) IN ('812', '21B')

update.id: update市町村コードと旧市町村コード

mapper.update:
UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" SET "shichosonCode" = ( SELECT CASE WHEN D."koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode" <> '' AND D."koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode" IS NOT NULL THEN D."koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode" ELSE D."shichosonCode" END AS ShichosonCode FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" AS A , rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" AS D WHERE A."hihokenshaNo" = D."hihokenshaNo" AND D."hihokenshaNo" = ( SELECT "hihokenshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" WHERE "hihokenshaNo" = A."hihokenshaNo" AND SUBSTRING("shikakuShutokuYMD", 1, 6) <= A."serviceTeikyoYM" ORDER BY "idoYMD" DESC , "edaNo" DESC LIMIT 1) AND D."idoYMD" = ( SELECT "idoYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" WHERE "hihokenshaNo" = A."hihokenshaNo" AND SUBSTRING("shikakuShutokuYMD", 1, 6) <= A."serviceTeikyoYM" ORDER BY "idoYMD" DESC , "edaNo" DESC LIMIT 1) AND D."edaNo" = ( SELECT "edaNo" FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" WHERE "hihokenshaNo" = A."hihokenshaNo" AND SUBSTRING("shikakuShutokuYMD", 1, 6) <= A."serviceTeikyoYM" ORDER BY "idoYMD" DESC , "edaNo" DESC LIMIT 1) AND D."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" <> '' AND A."serviceTeikyoYM" <= SUBSTRING(D."shikakuSoshitsuYMD", 1, 6) LIMIT 1) , "kyuShichosonCode" = ( SELECT D."kyuShichosonCode" FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" AS A , rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" AS D WHERE A."hihokenshaNo" = D."hihokenshaNo" AND D."hihokenshaNo" = ( SELECT "hihokenshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" WHERE "hihokenshaNo" = A."hihokenshaNo" AND SUBSTRING("shikakuShutokuYMD", 1, 6) <= A."serviceTeikyoYM" ORDER BY "idoYMD" DESC , "edaNo" DESC LIMIT 1) AND D."idoYMD" = ( SELECT "idoYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" WHERE "hihokenshaNo" = A."hihokenshaNo" AND SUBSTRING("shikakuShutokuYMD", 1, 6) <= A."serviceTeikyoYM" ORDER BY "idoYMD" DESC , "edaNo" DESC LIMIT 1) AND D."edaNo" = ( SELECT "edaNo" FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" WHERE "hihokenshaNo" = A."hihokenshaNo" AND SUBSTRING("shikakuShutokuYMD", 1, 6) <= A."serviceTeikyoYM" ORDER BY "idoYMD" DESC , "edaNo" DESC LIMIT 1)
AND ((D."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" = '') OR (D."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" <> '' AND A."serviceTeikyoYM" <= SUBSTRING(D."shikakuSoshitsuYMD", 1, 6))) LIMIT 1 )

UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" SET "futanWariaiNendo" = CAST((CAST(SUBSTRING("serviceTeikyoYM", 1, 4) as integer)- 2) AS text) WHERE SUBSTRING("serviceTeikyoYM", 5) IN ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07')
UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" SET "futanWariaiNendo" = SUBSTRING("serviceTeikyoYM", 1, 4) WHERE SUBSTRING("serviceTeikyoYM", 5) IN ('08','09','10','11','12')

update.id: update負担割合区分と負担割合エラーフラグ_一回目

mapper.update: UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" AS temp SET "futanWariaiErrorFlag" = '0' , "futanWariaiKubun" = ( SELECT dbT3114."futanWariaiKubun" FROM rgdb."DbT3114RiyoshaFutanWariaiMeisai" AS dbT3114 WHERE dbT3114."hihokenshaNo" = temp."hihokenshaNo" AND dbT3114."nendo" = temp."futanWariaiNendo" AND SUBSTRING(dbT3114."yukoKaishiYMD", 1, 6) <= temp."serviceTeikyoYM" AND temp."serviceTeikyoYM" <= SUBSTRING(dbT3114."yukoShuryoYMD", 1, 6) AND '201508' <= temp."serviceTeikyoYM" AND (dbT3114."nendo" || dbT3114."hihokenshaNo" || dbT3114."rirekiNo") IN (SELECT A."nendo" || A."hihokenshaNo" || MAX(A."rirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT3114RiyoshaFutanWariaiMeisai" AS A WHERE A."hihokenshaNo" = temp."hihokenshaNo" AND A."nendo" = temp."futanWariaiNendo" AND A."logicalDeletedFlag" <> 'true' GROUP BY A."hihokenshaNo" , A."nendo" LIMIT 1 ) )

update.id: update負担割合区分と負担割合エラーフラグ_二回目
update利用者負担減免被保険者番号

mapper.update: UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" AS temp SET "riyoshaFutanGenmenHihokenshaNo" = ( SELECT A."hihokenshaNo" FROM rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku" AS A WHERE A."hihokenshaNo" = temp."hihokenshaNo" AND SUBSTRING(A."tekiyoKaishiYMD", 1, 6) <= temp."serviceTeikyoYM" AND temp."serviceTeikyoYM" <= SUBSTRING(A."tekiyoShuryoYMD", 1, 6) AND A."ketteiKubun" = '1')

UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" SET "shukei0x02" = "atoTensuGokei" + "atoDekidakaTensuGokei" ,"shukei0x03" = ("atoTensuGokei" * "seikyuTensuTanka") + ("atoDekidakaTensuGokei" * 10) WHERE SUBSTRING("inputShikibetsuNo", 1, 3) NOT IN ('21C', '21D', '812', '21B')
UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" SET "shukei0x04" = "atoHokenSeikyugaku" + "atoDekidakaSeikyuGaku" WHERE SUBSTRING("inputShikibetsuNo", 1, 3) NOT IN ('812', '21B')

UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" SET "saikeiShukei0x04" = "atoSeikyuKingaku" * ("hokenKyufuritsu" - 90) / "hokenKyufuritsu" WHERE "futanWariaiKubun" = '10' AND 90 < "hokenKyufuritsu" AND SUBSTRING("inputShikibetsuNo", 1, 3) IN ('812', '21B')

UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" SET "saikeiShukei0x04" = "atoSeikyuKingaku" * ("hokenKyufuritsu" - 80) / "hokenKyufuritsu" WHERE "futanWariaiKubun" = '20' AND 80 < "hokenKyufuritsu" AND SUBSTRING("inputShikibetsuNo", 1, 3) IN ('812', '21B')

UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" SET "saikeiShukei0x04" = ( "atoSeikyuKingaku" * ("hokenKyufuritsu" - 90) / "hokenKyufuritsu") + ( "atoDekidakaSeikyuGaku" * ("hokenKyufuritsu" - 90) / "hokenKyufuritsu") WHERE "futanWariaiKubun" = '10' AND 90 < "hokenKyufuritsu" AND SUBSTRING("inputShikibetsuNo", 1, 3) NOT IN ('812', '21B')

UPDATE "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" SET "saikeiShukei0x04" = ( "atoSeikyuKingaku" * ("hokenKyufuritsu" - 80) / "hokenKyufuritsu") + ( "atoDekidakaSeikyuGaku" * ("hokenKyufuritsu" - 80) / "hokenKyufuritsu") WHERE "futanWariaiKubun" = '20' AND 80 < "hokenKyufuritsu" AND SUBSTRING("inputShikibetsuNo", 1, 3) NOT IN ('812', '21B')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" WHERE "shukeiKubun" = '減算' AND "kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" = '3' AND "rirekiFlag" = '1'
mapper.select: SELECT A."dataKubun" , A."shukeiKubun" , A."hyoNo" , '' AS shukeiNo , '1' AS shukeiTani , '' AS tateNo , '' AS yokoNo , A."inputShikibetsuNo" , A."shokisaiHokenshaNo" , A."hihokenshaNo" , A."serviceTeikyoYM" , A."kyufuJissekiKubunCode" , A."jigyoshaNo" , A."seiriNo" , A."meisaiNo" , A."motoSeiriNo" , '' AS "shikyukubunCode" , A."umareYMD" , A."yoKaigoJotaiKubunCode" , A."kyufuSakuseiKubunCode" , '' AS renban , B."recodeJunjiNo" AS recodeJunjiNo , B."serviceSyuruiCode" , B."serviceKomokuCode" , B."atoHokenbunSeikyugaku" , A."shikakuKubun" , A."shichosonCode" , A."kyuShichosonCode" , A."genbutsubunSonzaiFlag" , 1 AS shukei0x05 , B."atoHokenbunSeikyugaku" AS shukei0x06 FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" AS A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3029KyufujissekiTokuteiNyushosyaKaigoServiceHiyo" AS B ON A."inputShikibetsuNo" = B."inputShikibetsuNo" AND A."hihokenshaNo" = B."hiHokenshaNo" AND A."serviceTeikyoYM" = B."serviceTeikyoYM" AND A."jigyoshaNo" = B."jigyoshoNo" AND A."seiriNo" = B."seiriNo" WHERE B."recodeJunjiNo" = '99'
SELECT SUM("shukei0x01") FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" WHERE "shikakuKubun"='1号' AND "futanWariaiKubun" = '20' AND
SELECT SUM("shukei0x02") FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" WHERE "shikakuKubun"='1号' AND "futanWariaiKubun" = '20' AND
SELECT SUM("shukei0x03") FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" WHERE "shikakuKubun"='1号' AND "futanWariaiKubun" = '20' AND
SELECT SUM("shukei0x04") FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" WHERE "shikakuKubun"='1号' AND "futanWariaiKubun" = '20' AND
SELECT SUM("shukei0x01") FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" WHERE "shikakuKubun"='2号' AND "saikeibunHokenritu" <> '0' AND
SELECT SUM("shukei0x02") FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" WHERE "shikakuKubun"='2号' AND "saikeibunHokenritu" <> '0' AND
SELECT SUM("shukei0x03") FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" WHERE "shikakuKubun"='2号' AND "saikeibunHokenritu" <> '0' AND
SELECT SUM("saikeiShukei0x04") FROM "tempDwbTKyufujissekiShukeiKonkyo1" WHERE "shikakuKubun"='2号' AND "saikeibunHokenritu" <> '0' AND
